name: Boxing Holic
description:
I know you have sorted out iPhone and iPod folder.

Boxing Holic is new paradigm puzzle game from sorting out iPhone folder.

Get high score to sort out droped block in a huddle.

Boxing Holic provides Game Center Service, so you can compete ranking with your friends or international user.


Rules of game

1. You can move your block when your same color of block locate around your block. In this condition, the two blocks which is relocated, will be merged. You can call it as "Box".

2. You can put 4 same color of blocks in the "Box" . You can't put a different color of block in the "Box".

3. The "Box" can't move.

4. When you put 4 same color of block in "Box", it can destroy 8 directions of whole blocks around the "Box".

5. When you destroy blocks with the "Box", if there is another "Box", the "Box" makes same explosion with first exploded "Box".
You can call it "Chain Effect", If you make more Chain Effects, then you can get higher score.
